TopicTitle: How to bring back MIA kerbals

Articles.Content: I put Val on a plane but the game crashed as it was loading and when I restarted it said that Val was MIA. I tried editing the persistent file for my save when the game was closed and changed the status to alive and saved and closed but when I opened KSP her status still said MIA and the persistent file changed the status back I have mods and this is why I posted here but only mods that add parts (tantares, bdarmory, etc) I Just time warped a year as recommended in some posts but nothing has worked so far.
